description: Sets the background colour (BackgroundColor)
method_declaration: public void setBackgroundColor(PDGamma backgroundColor)

description: Set the noZoom flag
method_declaration: public void setNoZoom(boolean noZoom)

description: Sets the blend mode in the current graphics state
method_declaration: public void setBlendMode(BlendMode blendMode)

description: Get the hidden flag
method_declaration: public boolean isHidden()

description: Sets the optional Domain entry for this shading
method_declaration: public void setDomain(COSArray newDomain)

description: Sets the the non-stroking color space
method_declaration: public void setNonStrokingColorSpace(PDColorSpace colorSpace)

description: Get the size of the embedded file
method_declaration: public int getSize()

description: Create the right 'Validator' object for the given font type
method_declaration: protected FontValidator<? extends FontContainer<? extends PDFont>> getFontValidator(PreflightContext context, PDFont font)

description: This method checks the inputItem dictionary and call the exploreOutlineLevel method on the first child if it is not null
method_declaration: protected boolean validateItem(PreflightContext ctx, PDOutlineItem inputItem) throws ValidationException

description: Returns a styled instance
method_declaration: protected PDFont style(BaseFont font, TextStyle style)

description: merges two arrays
method_declaration: private void mergeArray(COSName name, COSDictionary dest, COSDictionary source)

description: The Lang element is optional but it is recommended. This method check the Syntax of the Lang if this entry is present
method_declaration: private void validateLang(PreflightContext ctx)

description: This method validates if OpenAction entry contains forbidden action type. It checks too if an Additional Action is present
method_declaration: private void validateActions(PreflightContext ctx) throws ValidationException

description: Calculate font size
method_declaration: private static float calculateFontSize(Matrix textMatrix, PDTextState textState)

description: Return true if the ID of the first dictionary is the same as the id of the last dictionary Return false otherwise
method_declaration: protected boolean compareIds(COSDictionary first, COSDictionary last)

description: Extracts and compares first and last trailers for PDF version between 1.1 and 1.4
method_declaration: protected void checkTrailersForLinearizedPDF14(PreflightContext ctx)

description: Check if the given character code has already been processed
method_declaration: private boolean isAlreadyProcessed(int code) throws GlyphException

description: Check the Extended Graphic State contains in the ShadingPattern dictionary if it is present. To check this ExtGState, this method uses the net.awl.edoc.pdfa.validation.graphics.ExtGStateContainer object
method_declaration: protected void checkGraphicState(PreflightContext context, PDPage page, PDShading shadingRes) throws ValidationException

description: Return true if the FontDescriptor has only one FontFile entry
method_declaration: protected boolean hasOnlyOneFontFile(PDFontDescriptor fontDescriptor)

description: Check dictionary entries. Only the Length entry is mandatory. In a PDF/A file, F, FFilter and FDecodeParms are forbidden
method_declaration: protected void checkDictionaryEntries(PreflightContext context, COSStream streamObj)

description: This method checks if one of declared Filter is LZWdecode. If LZW is found, the result list is updated with an error code
method_declaration: protected void checkFilters(COSStream stream, PreflightContext context)

description: Check if mandatory keys of linearized dictionary are present
method_declaration: protected void checkLinearizedDictionary(PreflightContext ctx, COSDictionary linearizedDict)

description: Put the element to check on the top of the ValidationPath and call the validation method on the Process
method_declaration: private static void callValidation(PreflightContext context, Object element, String processName) throws ValidationException
